Fed Up with Ad Blockers That Don’t Work?
Are you tired of constantly muting your device every time a YouTube ad interrupts your viewing experience? Or currently using a ad blocker that does not work? You’re not alone—many ad blockers have stopped working recently due to YouTube updates, leaving users frustrated. But our extension solves this problem by doing what others can't.

Seamless YouTube Viewing, No Hassles
Our simple yet effective extension automatically mutes your device the moment an ad starts playing. As soon as your content resumes, the audio comes back on, making your YouTube experience smooth and uninterrupted.

No More Interruptions. Keep your train of thought.
Unlike other solutions, our extension doesn’t block ads—it mutes them temporarily, so you can continue enjoying your content without the constant disruptions. No more fumbling to mute your device; just seamless viewing, every time.

Try It for Free!
Download now to see the difference for yourself. If you love the experience, consider supporting our developer efforts with a small donation—you’ll see a gentle reminder when the feature is in use.

Thank you for choosing a solution that works,
The Development Team
